item.title: Black Rock Coffee Bar Jumps 38% After $294.1 Million IPO
item.description: Black Rock Coffee Bar Inc. shares rose 38% in their trading debut after the drive-through-focused coffee chain raised $294.1 million in an initial public offering that priced above the top of its mark
